summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2720, for the improvement of 45th Avenue South from the south side of Ferdinand Street to a point about three hundred feet south of Hudson Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing, under Ordinance No. 31983 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
